name: Life Simulation Tower Defense
description: Using positive reinforcement such as your friends/family, parties, having a good job or jobs, and hobbies as towers, you will defend your sanity and from the enemies of life, such as debt, awkward social interactions, and those weird family members who always ask if you have a significant other yet. Each level is a set amount of time (a year, a few years, etc.). As you progress through the levels, the stage will update to hold your memories of events passed. Different events will add or take away certain towers. Breakups/Falling out with friends will remove some towers available, but promotions or marriage(s) will add new ones.
